About Leons Smoked Turkey Leons Smoked Turkey is a Fast Food restaurant located at 303 E Kings Hwy in Shreveport, LA . Leons Smoked Turkey has been described as an Great Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 8 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, BBQ, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
